title: Term Contract for the purchase of 06 shipments of Murban Crude Oil during the period from 2025 .04.01 to 2025.08.31
decision_details: - Bids have been invited from the registered suppliers of the Ceylon Petroleum Corporation for the purchase of 06 shipments of Murban Crude Oil during the period from 2025 04 01 to 2025 08 31. Six (06) bids have been submitted for the same. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Minister of Energy to award the relevant procurement to M/s Aditya Birla Global Trading (Singapore) Pte. Ltd., based on the recommendation of the Special Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee, was approved by the Cabinet.
